Package jetbrains.exodus.crypto

Interface StreamCipher

  • public interface StreamCipher
    Database ciphering facility uses stream ciphers. Any implementation of stream cipher which can be used by database engine should implement this interface. To create stream ciphers, implement StreamCipherProvider as a service provider interface.
    See Also:
    StreamCipherProvider

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Encrypts/decrypts specified byte.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init​(@NotNull
          @org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull byte[] key,
          long iv)
        Initializes the cipher from scratch with specified key and initialization vector. Call to crypt(byte) will fail if the cipher is not initialized.
        Parameters:
        key - cipher key of a length expected by particular implementation
        iv - 64-bit initialization vector

      • crypt

        byte crypt​(byte b)
        Encrypts/decrypts specified byte.
        Parameters:
        b - byte to encrypt/decrypt
        Returns:
        encrypted/decrypted byte
